hibernate-mapping.query: from omis.facility.domain.Unit unit where unit.facility = :facility order by unit.name
select count(*) from omis.facility.domain.Unit unit where unit.facility = :facility
select unit from omis.facility.domain.Unit unit inner join fetch unit.complex complex where complex = :complex order by unit.name
from omis.facility.domain.Unit unit where unit.facility = :facility and (:complex is null or unit.complex = :complex)
select unit from omis.facility.domain.Unit unit where unit.name = :name and unit.facility = :facility
select unit from omis.facility.domain.Unit unit where unit.name = :name and unit.facility = :facility and unit <> :unit
